org.drip.param.product
Class EmbeddedOptionSchedule

java.lang.Object
  org.drip.analytics.core.Serializer
      org.drip.param.product.EmbeddedOptionSchedule

public class EmbeddedOptionSchedule
extends Serializer

This class is a place holder for the embedded option schedule for the bond. Contains the schedule of exercise dates and factors, the exercise notice period, and the option is to call or put. Further, if the option is of the type fix-to-float on exercise, contains the post-exercise floater index and floating spread. If the exercise is not discrete (American option), the exercise dates/factors are discretized according to a pre-specified discretization grid.

Constructs the EOS from the array of dates and factors

Parameters:
adblDate - Array of dates
adblFactor - Matched Array of Factors
bIsPut - True (Put), False (Call)
iNoticePeriod - Exercise Notice Period
bFixToFloatOnExercise - True (Bond becomes a floater on call), False (Bond does not change)
dblFixToFloatExerciseDate - Date at which the fix to float conversion happens
strFloatIndex - Floater Rate Index
dblFixToFloatSpread - Floater Spread
Throws:
java.lang.Exception - Thrown if inputs are invalid
